hero.name: BRIAN
hero.title: Frontend Developer
hero.description: Passionate about creating high-performance web applications with the precision of a race car engineer

about.title: ABOUT ME
about.subtitle: Driven by passion, powered by code
about.description1: Just like how a perfectly tuned engine delivers optimal performance, I believe in crafting clean, efficient code that powers exceptional digital experiences. My passion for cars and motorcycles has taught me the importance of precision, attention to detail, and the pursuit of excellence.
about.description2: Whether I'm debugging code or tuning an engine, I approach every challenge with the same methodical mindset: understand the problem, find the root cause, and implement a solution that stands the test of time.

passions.codingDesc: Building the future, one line at a time

skills.title: SKILLS
skills.subtitle: My technical arsenal - finely tuned for maximum performance

projects.title: PROJECTS
projects.subtitle: My digital showroom - crafted with precision and built for speed
projects.viewAllDescription: Want to see more? Check out my GitHub for additional projects and contributions.

gameflix.title: Gameflix
gameflix.description: Web platform inspired by Netflix for enjoying video games via streaming. It allows users to explore a diverse catalog by genre and add titles to their list of favorites.

racingCRM.title: RacingCRM
racingCRM.description: Customer relationship management system for automotive dealerships with inventory management and sales tracking.

motoMeet.title: MotoMeet
motoMeet.description: Social platform for motorcycle enthusiasts to organize rides, share experiences, and connect with fellow riders.

turboChat.title: TurboChat
turboChat.description: Real-time chat application with video calling features and file sharing capabilities.

gearShift.title: GearShift E-commerce
gearShift.description: Modern e-commerce platform for automotive parts with advanced search and recommendation engine.

pitStop.title: PitStop Manager
pitStop.description: Task management application with team collaboration features and project tracking capabilities.

contact.title: GET IN TOUCH
contact.subtitle: Ready to start your project? Let's discuss how we can build something amazing together.
contact.connectDescription: I'm always interested in hearing about new opportunities and exciting projects. Whether you have a question about my work, want to collaborate, or just want to say hello, I'd love to hear from you!
